query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPST0117 ( MANDT, PSPID , GUBUN, HKONT, SEQNO, W_GBN, W_WRITDAT, W_REQDAT, W_REQMAN, W_WRKNM, W_GBN2, W_ADMNM, W_ADMTEL, W_POSID, W_INST, STATE ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #PSPID#, #GUBUN#, #HKONT#, #SEQNO#, #W_GBN#, #WRITDAT#, #REQDAT#, #REQNM#, #WRKNM#, #LIFGBN#, #MANNM#, #MANTEL#, #W_POSID#, 'X', '1' )
